patthana14.31:1.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:2.1: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:4.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:5.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.31:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:7.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:8.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.31:9.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:10.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:11.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.31:12.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
